Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Luckily \Luck"i*ly\, adv. [From {Lucky}.] In a lucky manner; by good fortune; fortunately; -- used in a good sense; as, they luckily escaped injury. [1913 Webster]
luckily adv : by good fortune; "fortunately the weather was good" [syn: {fortunately}, {fortuitously}, {as luck would have it}] [ant: {unfortunately}, {unfortunately}]
